alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 30 at 2:52PM CDT until March 30 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Yazoo County in central Mississippi... Southeastern Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... Southeastern Sharkey County in west central Mississippi... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Tallulah, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Eagle Bend around 305 PM CDT. Redwood around 310 PM CDT. Valley Park around 315 PM CDT. Phoenix around 325 PM CDT. Tinsley around 335 PM CDT. Little Yazoo around 340 PM CDT. Yazoo City and Myrleville around 345 PM CDT. Benton around 350 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Satartia, Bentonia and Richmond. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
